mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.ACCOUNT_NAME as accountName, a.SIGNATURE_TIME as signatureTime, a.SIGNATURE as signature, a.EMAIL_ADDRESS as emailAddress, a.MAIL_CODE as mailCode, a.OTHER_NATIONALITY as otherNationality, a.USA_ITIN as usaItin, a.OVERSEAS_TAX_NUMBER as overseasTaxNumber, a.REFERENCE_NUMBER as referenceNumber, a.OTHER_BIRTHDAY as otherBirthday, a.USA_COUNTRY_AGREEMENT as usaCountryAgreement, a.EXPLAIN_ADDRESS as explainAddress, a.CONSENT_STATUS as consentStatus, a.CONSENT_TAX as consentTax, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_WBEN_CONTRACT( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ACCOUNT_NAME , SIGNATURE_TIME , SIGNATURE , EMAIL_ADDRESS , MAIL_CODE , OTHER_NATIONALITY , USA_ITIN , OVERSEAS_TAX_NUMBER , REFERENCE_NUMBER , OTHER_BIRTHDAY , USA_COUNTRY_AGREEMENT , EXPLAIN_ADDRESS , CONSENT_STATUS , CONSENT_TAX , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{accountName} , #{signatureTime} , #{signature} , #{emailAddress} , #{mailCode} , #{otherNationality} , #{usaItin} , #{overseasTaxNumber} , #{referenceNumber} , #{otherBirthday} , #{usaCountryAgreement} , #{explainAddress} , #{consentStatus} , #{consentTax} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_WBEN_CONTRACT SET DEL_FLAG = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}

ID ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_WBEN_CONTRACT
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName} ,
SIGNATURE_TIME = #{signatureTime} ,
SIGNATURE = #{signature} ,
EMAIL_ADDRESS = #{emailAddress} ,
MAIL_CODE = #{mailCode} ,
OTHER_NATIONALITY = #{otherNationality} ,
USA_ITIN = #{usaItin} ,
OVERSEAS_TAX_NUMBER = #{overseasTaxNumber} ,
REFERENCE_NUMBER = #{referenceNumber} ,
OTHER_BIRTHDAY = #{otherBirthday} ,
USA_COUNTRY_AGREEMENT = #{usaCountryAgreement} ,
EXPLAIN_ADDRESS = #{explainAddress} ,
CONSENT_STATUS = #{consentStatus} ,
CONSENT_TAX = #{consentTax} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_WBEN_CONTRACT( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ACCOUNT_NAME , SIGNATURE_TIME , SIGNATURE , EMAIL_ADDRESS , MAIL_CODE , OTHER_NATIONALITY , USA_ITIN , OVERSEAS_TAX_NUMBER , REFERENCE_NUMBER , OTHER_BIRTHDAY , USA_COUNTRY_AGREEMENT , EXPLAIN_ADDRESS , CONSENT_STATUS , CONSENT_TAX , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.accountName} , #{item.signatureTime} , #{item.signature} , #{item.emailAddress} , #{item.mailCode} , #{item.otherNationality} , #{item.usaItin} , #{item.overseasTaxNumber} , #{item.referenceNumber} , #{item.otherBirthday} , #{item.usaCountryAgreement} , #{item.explainAddress} , #{item.consentStatus} , #{item.consentTax} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_WBEN_CONTRACT SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , ACCOUNT_NAME = #{item.accountName} , SIGNATURE_TIME = #{item.signatureTime} , SIGNATURE = #{item.signature} , EMAIL_ADDRESS = #{item.emailAddress} , MAIL_CODE = #{item.mailCode} , OTHER_NATIONALITY = #{item.otherNationality} , USA_ITIN = #{item.usaItin} , OVERSEAS_TAX_NUMBER = #{item.overseasTaxNumber} , REFERENCE_NUMBER = #{item.referenceNumber} , OTHER_BIRTHDAY = #{item.otherBirthday} , USA_COUNTRY_AGREEMENT = #{item.usaCountryAgreement} , EXPLAIN_ADDRESS = #{item.explainAddress} , CONSENT_STATUS = #{item.consentStatus} , CONSENT_TAX = #{item.consentTax} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_WBEN_CONTRACT SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , ACCOUNT_NAME = #{accountName} , SIGNATURE_TIME = #{signatureTime} , SIGNATURE = #{signature} , EMAIL_ADDRESS = #{emailAddress} , MAIL_CODE = #{mailCode} , OTHER_NATIONALITY = #{otherNationality} , USA_ITIN = #{usaItin} , OVERSEAS_TAX_NUMBER = #{overseasTaxNumber} , REFERENCE_NUMBER = #{referenceNumber} , OTHER_BIRTHDAY = #{otherBirthday} , USA_COUNTRY_AGREEMENT = #{usaCountryAgreement} , EXPLAIN_ADDRESS = #{explainAddress} , CONSENT_STATUS = #{consentStatus} , CONSENT_TAX = #{consentTax} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PER_WBEN_CONTRACT a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
